key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: idle-brightness
key.summary: The brightness of the screen when idle
key.description: This is the laptop panel screen brightness used when the session is idle.

key.name: idle-dim
key.summary: Dim the screen after a period of inactivity
key.description: If the screen should be dimmed to save power when the computer is idle.

key.name: sleep-inactive-ac-timeout
key.summary: Sleep timeout computer when on AC
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on AC power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep. A value of 0 means never.

key.name: sleep-inactive-ac-type
key.summary: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when inactive
key.description: The type of sleeping that should be performed when the computer is inactive.

key.name: sleep-inactive-battery-timeout
key.summary: Sleep timeout computer when on battery
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on battery power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep. A value of 0 means never.

key.name: sleep-inactive-battery-type
key.summary: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when inactive
key.description: The type of sleeping that should be performed when the computer is inactive.

key.name: button-suspend
key.description: The action to take when the system suspend button is pressed.

key.name: button-hibernate
key.description: The action to take when the system hibernate button is pressed.

key.name: button-sleep
key.description: The action to take when the system sleep (non-specific type) button is pressed.

key.name: button-power
key.description: The action to take when the system power button is pressed.

key.name: critical-battery-action
key.description: The action to take when the battery is critically low.
